abstract: JPMorgan Chase is close to subleasing about 270,000 square feet of office space at 277 Park Ave. to France’s Natixis, as the banking giant moves its investment bank to Bear Stearns’s former headquarters, according to Real Estate Weekly.
snippet: JPMorgan Chase is close to subleasing about 270,000 square feet of office space at 277 Park Ave. to France’s Natixis, as the banking giant moves its investment bank to Bear Stearns’s former headquarters, according to Real Estate Weekly.
lead_paragraph: Ever since JPMorgan Chase closed on its deal for Bear Stearns, the financial giant has been relocating its investment banking staff to its new trophy building on Madison Avenue in Midtown Manhattan.

headline.main: Natixis Said Close to Subleasing JPMorgan Office Space
